alert.note: Alert for Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 12 at 10:50PM PDT until March 13 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties including Tulelake, Newell, Dorris, MacDoel, and highways 97 and 139. * WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties
